ET.Dialog.Instructions.Token: Choose which actors to apply the effect to. Remember to target the tokens first should you choose the 'Apply Targets' option.
ET.Dialog.Title: Effect Application
ET.Button.Label: Transfer Effects
ET.doubleEmbedded.error: Unable to update effects of owned items.
ET.AE.config.title: Effective Transferral Configuration
ET.AE.config.buttonBlockTooltip: If checked, this effect cannot be transferred via the item header button.
ET.AE.config.chatBlockTooltip: If checked, this effect cannot be transferred through the use of an item.
ET.AE.config.displayCardBlock: Block transfer via chat log button
ET.AE.config.displayCardBlockTooltip: If checked, this effect cannot be transferred through the chat log button.
ET.AE.config.transferTargetsTooltip: Whether an effect is valid to transfer to the user or the user's targets.
ET.AE.config.alwaysTransferTooltip: If checked, users cannot opt out of transferring this effect.
setting.includeEquipTransfer.name: Default to transferring all effects
setting.includeEquipTransfer.hint: Transfer effects for which 'Transfer Effect to Actor' is enabled. These are usually excluded as they are transferred to the actor on item equip and are already present on the source actor as aresult. Effects can still be excluded through other means like the settings below.
setting.neverButtonTransfer.name: Disable transfer via button
setting.neverButtonTransfer.hint: Disables effect transfer by the item sheet header button. Also hides the button as a result.
setting.neverChatTransfer.name: Disable transfer via item roll
setting.neverChatTransfer.hint: Disables effect transfer initiated by rolling an item.
setting.neverDisplayCardTransfer.name: Disable transfer via the chat log
setting.neverDisplayCardTransfer.hint: Removes effect transfer buttons from the chat log when an item is used.
setting.debugMode.name: Enable debugging mode
setting.debugMode.hint: Enables logging for various things in the module.
setting.hideButtonText.name: Icon-only transfer button
setting.hideButtonText.hint: Hide the text of the item sheet header button for transferring effects.
setting.permanentTransfer.name: Permanently transfer effects
setting.permanentTransfer.hint: Effects are applied permanently and have to be deleted manually. Warpgate's revert button will not be available.
setting.applyIdenticalEffects.name: Apply identical effects
setting.applyIdenticalEffects.hint: Effects with the same name as an already present effect will be applied regardless.
